data.title: Lambert and Butler Popular Film Stars
data.text:
LAMBERT & BUTLER POPULAR FILM STARS

Issuing Company: Lambert and Butler

Country of Issue: New Zealand

Year of Issue: 1920s

Color/B&W: B&W Glossy

Number of Cards in Set: 50

Card Size: 1 3/8" x 2 5/8"

Issued as insert with what product: Cigarettes

Notes: Same set issued with three somewhat different back designs as follows:

Type 1. "Popular Film Stars" title in one line

Type 2. "Popular Film Stars" title in two lines - no mention of Varsity cigarettes

Type 3. "Popular Film Stars" title in two lines - Varsity cigarette ad on back

There are variations for card 21 and 27.

This is basically the same set as Westminster Popular Film Stars with a different cigarette ad on the back.

1. Mae Murray

2. Barbara La Marr

3. Mary Pickford

4. Harold Lloyd

5. Rudolph Valentino

6. Doris Kenyon

7. Alice Terry

8. Ramon Novarro
